title: Ranked Game Lobby Screen Looks Downgraded
body:
(THIS IS ABOUT THE ALPHA CLIENT)
The game lobby screen for ranked now looks downgraded, it does not have a background with animated visuals and the banners are still images now instead of the epic looking waving banners. This i feel is like total downgrade compared to the normal client and now looks really cheap. I think Riot should return some of the original elements (such as waving banners) of the ranked game lobby screen because it looks better and would actually suit the new interface.

replies.body:
Hey OP,

As the client that you're using is still an ALPHA, there are a lot of things that are still being worked on and not implemented, and that includes visual polish (so animations and details).

I LOVE that type of stuff so just like you, keen beans for it to finally all get in there!
